snippet.title: Hitman 3 - Official Announcement Trailer | Stadia
snippet.description:
The World of Assassination Trilogy comes to Stadia. Hitman and Hitman 2 both arrive this September, with Hitman launching into Stadia Pro. Hitman 3, the dramatic conclusion to the trilogy, is set to release January 2021.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://youtube.com/GoogleStadia
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/GoogleStadia
Follow us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/GoogleStadia
